fields.request: Manual QA: Verify node proxy session requires staff credentials
fields.request_details:
1. Sign a /nodes/proxy/session/ payload with a trusted node but omit the staff password; confirm the response is 401 and no login_url is returned.
2. Repeat with an incorrect staff password and ensure the API responds 403 without creating a proxy login token.
3. Submit the request with the correct staff credentials and confirm the login_url works while the account stays staff-only (no superuser escalation).
4. Redeem the login_url once and verify the token cannot be reused after the initial redirect.
